page.title: 03CHANGE
page.content:
The people we talked to mentioned a number of changes. One of the biggest was the growth of the village, in 1947 there were only 8 houses in Bomere Heath. It now has a{population}of approx. 2500. The most recent development is the{Grove Estate. }
With an increase in size, some people who had lived here a long time thought that the newcomers were less friendly. An increase in size has led to an increase in vandalism & noise, particularly from motor bikes. However not all the changes have been adverse. Some people said that the increase in size has led to{improved facilities.}
